type.models: Blighted Nyss Archers, Blighted Nyss Raptors, Legion units with Stealth

benefits.ingameeffect: Additionally, you gain +1 on your starting roll for the game.

Place Annyssa Ryvaal and Blighted Nyss Raptor units after normal deployment. These models are placed at the same time as your models with Advance Deployment (if any). These models must be placed within you normal deployment zone.
Lesser warbeasts and Raeks in Lylith's battlegroup gain Advance Move. (Before the start of the game but after both players have deployed, a model with Advance Move can make a full advance.)

type.models: Non-character Legion warbeasts with ranged weapons

benefits.ingameeffect: For every two Strider Deathstalker solo in the army, place one 4" AOE forest template anywhere completely within 20" of the back edge of Lylith's deployment zone after terrain has been placed but before either player deploys his army. Forest templates cannot be placed within 3" of another terrain feature, including forest templates.
Warbeasts in Lylith's battlegroup gain +2 SPD during your first turn of the game.

type.models: Beast Mistress, Blighted Nyss Shepherd, Legion solos with ranged weapons

benefits.ingameeffect: Fore each Strider Deathstalker solo in the army, you can redeploy one model/unit after both players have deployed but before the first player's first turn. The redeployed models must be placed on the table in a location they could have been deployed initially.
Units gain Stealth during the first round of the game.

Fore each Blighted Nyss Shepherd solo in the army, one warbeast in Lylyth's battlegroup can use it's animus during your first turn without being forced. These warbeasts cannot also be forced to use their animi that turn.
Lesser warbeasts in Thagrosh's battlegroup gain Advance Deployment
Your deployment zone is extended 2"' forward.

type.models: Blighted Nyss Legionnaires, Legion units with Flight
Incubi, Spell Martyrs, The Forsaken, Legion solos with Flight, Blighted Nyss Shepherds

benefits.ingameeffect: Additionally, units and solos with Flight gain Advance Deployment
You gain + 1 on your starting roll for the game.
Blighted Nyss Legionnaire units gain +2 SPD during your first turn of the game.
For every two heavy warbeasts in the army, add a Blighted Nyss Shepherd solo to the army free of cost. These solos ignore FA restrictions.

type.models: Beast Mistress, Blighted Nyss Shepherd, Blighted Nyss Sorceress & Hellion, Spell Martyr, Succubus

benefits.ingameeffect: Each Spawning Vessel in the army begins the game with one corpse token.
Add one warbeast to each Beast Mistress's battlegroup free of cost.
Beast Mistresses and warbeasts in their battlegroups gain Advance Deployment

type.models: Blighted Nyss Shepherds, Incubi, Spell Martyrs, Legion solos with Magic Ability

benefits.ingameeffect: Warbeasts in Vayl's battlegroup gain +2 SPD during your first turn of the game.
The LOS of models without Eyeless Sight is reduced to 8" during the first round of the game.
Non-character solos in this army gaim Advance Deployment.
You gain +1 on your starting roll for the game.
Warbeasts with Flight gain +2 SPD during your first turn of the game.

type.models: Blighted Nyss Hex Hunters, Blighted Nyss Swordsmen, Blackfrost Shard

benefits.ingameeffect: You gain + 1 on your starting roll for the game.
Blighted Nyss Swordsman units gain +2 SPD during your first turn of the game.
Models/units in your army gain Pathfinder during your first turn of the game.

type.models: Blighted Nyss Swordsmen, Blighted Ogrun units
Blighted Nyss Shepherd, Blighted Ogrun solos, Succubus

benefits.ingameeffect: Models/units gain Stealth during the first round of the game.

Friendly models/units can begin the game affected by Rhyas' upkeep spells. These spells and their targets must be declared before either player sets up models. Rhyas does not pay fury to upkeep these spells during your first turn.
Blighted Ogrun models gain Advance Deployment

type.models: Non-character Legion warbeasts with Flight, Nephilim warbeasts
Blighted Nyss Shepherd, Blighted Nyss Sorceress & Hellion, Spell Martyrs

benefits.ingameeffect: Spell Martyr solos gain Advance Deployment
You gain + 1 on your starting roll for the game.
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward.

type.models: Blighted Nyss Sorceress & Hellion, Incubi, Spell Martyrs

benefits.ingameeffect: Spell Martyrs gain Stealth during the first round of the game.

(The nephilim warbeasts must be different) Nephilim warbeasts gain Advance Move. (Before the start of the game but after both players have deployed, a model with Advance Move can make a full advance.)
Lesser warbeasts in Absylonia's battlegroup gain Advance Deployment.

For each Forsaken solo in the army, one heavy warbeast in Absylonia's battlegroup gains Advance Move. (Before the start of the game but after both players have deployed, a model with Advance Move can make a full advance.)

type.models: Strider units, Legion units with Flight
Forsaken, Strider solos, Legion solos with Flight

benefits.ingameeffect: Flying models gain +2 SPD during your first turn of the game.
Units in the army gain Advance Deployment
Warbeasts in Absylonia’s battlegroup can use their animi during your first turn of the game without being forced. Warbeasts cannot also be forced to use their animi that turn.

type.models: Spawning Vessel, Legion units with Magic Ability
The Forsaken, Incubi, Spell Martyrs, Legion solos with Magic Ability

benefits.ingameeffect: For each Blighted Nyss Sorceress & Hellion solo in the army, you can redeploy one model/unit after both players have deployed but before the first player's first turn. The redeployed models must be placed on the table in a location they could have been deployed initially.
Increase the COST of spells and animi cast by enemy models by + 1 during the first round of the game.
Warbeasts in Bethayne's battlegroup gain +2 SPD during your first turn of the game.
